body: FJB, I really appreciate your simple file that focuses on just the issue at hand.  I can verify that the file is working on my machine and that you are getting the issue because of your version of Rhino. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Yh-B8VrdxHgZZHr1TA7Vx2uAyhuaaGSox0cCxnNcb1datNn9rwYK1OdbixlkLGXz8T2Gszpogx158WMuCSCKqXP7A*PpSHEf/MeshVertices.JPG) I am nearly positive that the component would work as-is if you update your Rhino to the most recent Service Release (SR 12) but I think that we can find a good workaround in the meantime if this is difficult. Can you let me know if the component in the attached file works with your SR5 version? Thank you, -Chris
